frontMatter.title: Waving Hand EmojiðŸ‘‹
frontMatter.summary: I made this animated emoji on the index page. It was surprisingly simple.

authorDetails.name: kamal kashyap
authorDetails.text1: The name is kamal (which is short for kamal kumar or kamal kashyap, depending on where you know me from). I am a 17-year-old North Indian with a tech sort of background and a lot to say about the trends and direction of the scientific world.
authorDetails.text2: I'm very dedicated to learn new things and to truly belive that you should never stop learning. I enjoy creating different things, whether that be websites, application or anything in between.
authorDetails.text3: In my first freelancing work as a web developer I feel like I've been very lucky to experience a broad and diverce part of projects and tasks. I get to deal with everything from user feedback, design and to backend tests and improving parts of our daily operations.

prev.title: New website!
prev.summary: I made another new version of my blog. Not long since I made a big update to it. Now I used next.js. I also moved the blog to the index page so it will be more noticable.
